entry.title: Saturday: Blowing snow. High minus 19 with temperature falling to minus 25 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 19 with temperature falling to minus 25 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 34. POP 60%
